rooms.description: Spacious area designed for welcoming guests, aligned with Vastu principles emphasizing the entry facing east. Natural light enters via large windows.
Lively central living area with open space, featuring Kerala-style wooden fixtures. Natural ventilation is ensured via cross-ventilation and south-facing windows.
Integrated dining space adjoining the living room, designed for family meals and traditional gatherings.
Functional kitchen area with modern amenities, keeping in line with Kerala style interiors. Proper exhaust and adequate lighting are ensured.
Cozy bedroom for guests, placed on the north side in accordance with Vastu principles for balanced energy flow.
Essential bathroom adjacent to guest bedroom and living area. Ventilation is provided through strategically placed windows.

openings.description: Primary entryway, adhering to traditional Kerala design with wooden door detailing.
Large window ensuring natural light and ventilation in the living space.
Operable window for proper kitchen ventilation.

openings.location: Between living room and dining area
openings.description: Separate door facilitating easy movement between spaces.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, designed for optimum privacy and comfort. The room faces south to maximize natural light.
Private bathroom adjoining master bedroom with modern fixtures and proper ventilation in alignment with Kerala design aesthetics.
Additional bedroom for family or children, ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu principles by positioning it on the west side.

openings.description: Door leading to a small balcony with an eastward view, promoting balance as per Vastu guidelines.
Ensures ample natural light in the master bedroom while maintaining privacy.

garage.description: Spacious two-car garage designed with traditional Kerala elements, ensuring functionality and aesthetic integration with the overall structure.
